short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your Streamloots Cards without leaving the Stream, Enhance your Streamloots experience and login to Loot's Tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use your Streamloots Cards without leaving the Stream, Sync Streamloots with other services, enhance your Streamloots' Experience, and log in to Loot's Tools with Loot's Tools Browser Companion!

Enhancements include using Streamloots Cards with your favourite Streamers without leaving their stream, or adding new redeem fields (Files, Images, Numbers and Dropdown options) when using Cards!
Services syncable with Streamloots include Discord and Twitch.
